name: Game A Week 1 - 8 Hour Minigame Submission
name_original: Game A Week 1 - 8 Hour Minigame Submission
description: Myself and Kevin from uni  worked on this for about 6-8 hours as a very last minute decision to join in with a course doing a game a week. This weeks theme was minigames, so we went with something a little like Warioware.
